Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: @, did you hear? Someone paid {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}} to build {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}} a house! {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}} won't tell me who it was, though.#$e#Regardless of who paid, I love seeing this kind of community support in Pelican Town!$h
Entries.summer_Town_57_40: #$c .3#Ah, my flowers are growing wonderfully!$h#$c .3#Good morning! Can you smell the sweet scent of these dew-lilies?#$e#It's early but the air is already quite warm. Summer is nice for an old {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Guy:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisGender}}}} like me hehe.
Entries.summer_Thu: The saloon gets pretty lively at night.#$e#I like to visit once a week or so to catch up on things. And to get a taste of {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}}' authentic spaghetti.
Entries.summer_Fri: Hmm... I wonder if it's anyone's birthday today? I'd better check the calendar by {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s shop.
Entries.fall_Fri4: Have you tried {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}}' 'secret' spaghetti sauce?$s#$b#...The ingredients may be secret, but the smell isn't.#$b#I'll see you later.
Entries.winter_Sun: Hi there, @! How're you doing today?$h#$e#If you see {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}, tell her I say 'hi'.

Entries.fall_9.000: Erm... Doctor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}}? This is completely confidential, right?

BeforeMovie.Text: I watched cowboy movies when I was a kid... I'm glad to see the art is still alive!

AfterMovie.Text: Heh, that was great! Really brought me back...$h
